code: import{Component}from'react';import{formatDistanceToNow}from'date-fns';import KG from'date-fns/locale/en-AU';import'./task.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default class Task extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={label:this.props.label};this.onEditingChange=e=>{this.setState({label:e.target.value});};this.onEditingChangeComplete=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){this.props.onToggleEditing();}};}render(){const{onDeleted,onToggleCompleted,onToggleEditing,completed,editing,date}=this.props;let classNames='';if(completed){classNames+='completed';}if(editing){classNames+='editing';}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:classNames,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"view",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"toggle",type:"checkbox",onChange:onToggleCompleted,checked:completed}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{onClick:onToggleCompleted,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"description",children:this.state.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"created",children:"created ".concat(formatDistanceToNow(date,{includeSeconds:true,locale:KG,addSuffix:true}))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon icon-edit",onClick:onToggleEditing}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon icon-destroy",onClick:onDeleted})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"edit",defaultValue:this.state.label,onChange:this.onEditingChange,onKeyDown:this.onEditingChangeComplete})]});}}Task.defaultProps={date:new Date()};
